attributes.action: Propose a New 'NHS Bank Holiday' to commemorate our NHS & battle to defeat CV19
attributes.additional_details: It goes without saying how much the nation loves the NHS which was evidence by the public 'clap' in appreciation of it. Given the NHS are putting their lives on the line daily in an effort to defeat the virus, without whom we would not, the day that it is ultimately beaten, needs to be commemorated by a unique celebration by the nation of our NHS workers. We commemorate war heroes, so why not our NHS, The true heroes against the invisible enemy, CV-19
attributes.background: When the Covid-19 virus is defeated, bring a motion to Parliament for a new 'NHS Bank Holiday' to commemorate the day that our NHS defeated the virus and to celebrate the hard work and our national pride in the world's best health service

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
